heading: Speak with an Admissions Advisor
paragraph:
Join a growing network of industry professionals who have transformed their lives with lucrative careers in technology.
  • Learn more about Boca Code certificate courses
  • Find out which course is right for you
  • Discuss tuition, payment plans, and scholarships

form.motivation: Interested in our courses, hiring talented engineers, or something else? Reach out now.
form.conditions: By clicking the button above, you accept our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. You agree to receive calls and emails about our courses and workshops.

title_container.heading: Find Your Career Path
title_container.paragraph: Choose the right training for your career. If you're not sure, schedule a call with an Admissions Advisor here to find out which classes are right for you.

pricing_info_variable.heading: Data Analytics and Python
pricing_info_variable.paragraph: Learn how to slice and dice our data in countless ways and learn a powerful language and tool set that gives us unlimited power to analyze and visualize our data.
pricing_info_variable.finance_msg: Finance for as little as 0% for 24 months

pricing_info_variable.heading: AR / VR and Game Development
pricing_info_variable.paragraph: Learn the valuable art of Game Development. Create a portfolio of games and learn the trade in our unique 3-week course.
pricing_info_variable.finance_msg: Finance for as little as 0% for 24 months

pricing_info_variable.heading: Intro to Web Development
pricing_info_variable.paragraph: Learn Web Development from scratch. Create a portfolio of websites and learn the trade in our valuable 3-week course.
pricing_info_variable.finance_msg: Finance for as little as 0% for 24 months

pricing_info_variable.heading: Software Engineering Career Track
pricing_info_variable.paragraph: Learn to build web, mobile, and desktop apps, as well as backend, database, API, cloud, security, devOps, interview preparation, and project management.
pricing_info_variable.finance_msg: Finance for as little as 0% for 24 months

pricing_info_variable.heading: Intro to JavaScript and Node.js
pricing_info_variable.paragraph: Learn Backend Development and create REST APIs with JavaScript, Node.js, and Express in 3 weeks.
pricing_info_variable.finance_msg: Finance for as little as 0% for 3 months

pricing_info_variable.heading: React
pricing_info_variable.paragraph: Learn React in 3 weeks and build your first React apps! This part-time, project-based course will teach you the skills you need to build React applications. You'll learn the fundamentals of React, including components, state, and props, and you'll build a portfolio of projects to showcase your skills. Enroll today and start your journey to becoming a React developer!
pricing_info_variable.finance_msg: Finance for as little as 0% for 3 months

title_container_3.heading: Creativity
title_container_3.paragraph: Software Engineering is a surprisingly creative field. Building and designing apps requires a balance between logic and creativity using both hemispheres of our brains.

qualities.title: Inventive Project Ideas
qualities.content: Coming up with new projects to build can be like an artist deciding what to paint, only with fewer limitations.

qualities.title: Problem Solving
qualities.content: Elegant and efficient solutions to complex problems require creative thinking and innovation.

qualities.title: Styling & Designing Sites
qualities.content: We encourage students to get creative and have fun and pour themselves in styling their sites.

qualities.title: User Experience (UX) Design
qualities.content: Many enjoy focusing on creating intuitive and enjoyable user interfaces that are aesthetically pleasing, easy to use, and efficient.

qualities.title: Algorithm Design
qualities.content: Designing algorithms that solve problems optimally often requires creative thinking. We come up with novel approaches to turn inventive processes into code.

qualities.title: Innovation & Research
qualities.content: Software engineers need to stay up to date with the latest developments, explore new ideas, and conduct research to innovate and improve existing systems.

qualities.title: Experimenting with Generative AI
qualities.content: New technologies are constantly emerging. We need to stay on top of the latest advancements and utilize the best tools to optimize our work.

qualities.title: Architectural Design
qualities.content: Designing software involves making decisions about how different components will interact, how data will flow, and how the system will be structured.

qualities.title: Collaboration & Teamwork
qualities.content: Creative problem-solving and brainstorming are common in teams, where individuals contribute diverse perspectives and ideas to find the best solutions.

heading.text: Get the training you need to land the job of your dreams

content.text: Whether you're a beginner or have years of experience, we have courses to help you learn and be certified in software engineering, web development, mobile development, security, dev-ops, project management, Web3, AI, and more.
